name: TenThingsinTech
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Every morning, tech editors at Business Insider round up the biggest tech news. Hear the latest on Apple, Facebook, Google, Snapchat, and more. It's what you need to know before you go. And for more tech news, head to www.businessinsider.com/sai
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
